name: Fight Jump
description:
Jump and fight your way through enemies! Fight Jump is an exciting puzzle fighting game where you need to plan your next move wisely to maximize the number of kills and avoid the deadly traps!​

● Collect coins to unlock 8 different awesome characters with various skill sets
● Go head-to-head with rival enemies and use various attacks to fight your way through!
● Earn daily rewards
● Complete intense quests to upgrade your character skill sets
● Strategize your moves to last as long as you can!

Jump left or right to kill the enemies. Beware of the traps!
